title: Atlanta Café Crawl
shortDescription: Discover the best café spots in Atlanta with this delightful scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: Explore Atlanta's vibrant coffee culture, visiting cozy cafés, trendy coffee shops, and unique spots loved by locals. Perfect for coffee enthusiasts or anyone looking for a caffeine-filled adventure!

missions.title: Dancing Goats Coffee Bar
missions.shortDescription: Start your tour at Dancing Goats Coffee Bar, known for its signature brews.
missions.hint: Hint: Look for a spot with a cozy patio and delicious lattes in Ponce City Market.

missions.title: Chattahoochee Coffee Company
missions.shortDescription: Visit this hidden gem with stunning views of the Chattahoochee River.
missions.hint: Hint: This café is tucked away in an apartment complex but worth the visit for its serene riverside vibe.

missions.title: Brash Coffee
missions.shortDescription: Stop by Brash Coffee for a minimalist coffee experience.
missions.hint: Hint: Located in a repurposed shipping container in the heart of Westside Provisions District.

missions.title: Chrome Yellow Trading Co.
missions.shortDescription: Enjoy artisanal coffee and chill vibes at Chrome Yellow.
missions.hint: Hint: Look for a hip coffee spot with minimalist décor in the Old Fourth Ward.

missions.title: Revelator Coffee Company
missions.shortDescription: End your café crawl at Revelator Coffee, known for its modern aesthetics and exceptional brews.
missions.hint: Hint: This café is located in Downtown Atlanta and is a favorite among locals.
